alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Missaukee; Roscommon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 11:57AM EDT until May 11 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gaylord has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Crawford County in northern Michigan... Northwestern Roscommon County in northern Michigan... Northeastern Missaukee County in northern Michigan... * Until 1230 PM EDT. * At 1157 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near North Higgins Lake to near Moorestown, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... North Higgins Lake and Higgins Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
